name: Streamer's Life
detailed_description:
RPG-Simulation game where you can create your own streamer and see whether you can overcome difficulties of being streamer or not.
How parents can affect your life as a streamer?
What events streamers stumble upon?
How often you'll rage on troll type of viewers?
Your choices can lead to interesting consequences.
All these questions and many more are answered in the game.

short_description: RPG-Simulation game where you can create your own streamer and see whether you can overcome difficulties of being streamer or not.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Additional Notes: minimum resolution of 1024x768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
